languages.text: {n}Старика начинают сотрясать конвульсии, свидетельствующие об агонии. Он поднимает на вас уже ничего не видящий взгляд.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... если позволено умирающему просить вас о последней воле... Не сообщайте никому, что я был тем, кто отпер двери... иначе... иначе они придут и за моей родней... моим домом..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Благородие... если позволено умирающему просить вас о последней воле..." {n}Старик поднимает на вас уже ничего не видящий взгляд.{/n} "Не сообщайте никому, что я был тем, кто отпер двери... иначе... иначе они придут и за моей родней... моим домом..."

languages.text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."
languages.original_text: {n}Старика начинают сотрясать конвульсии, свидетельствующие об агонии. Он поднимает на вас уже ничего не видящий взгляд.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... если позволено умирающему просить вас о последней воле... Не сообщайте никому, что я был тем, кто отпер двери... иначе... иначе они придут и за моей родней... моим домом..."

If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

languages.text: {n}初老の男は間近に迫る死を知らせるように激しく震え始める。それから、すでに視力を失った目を上げてあなたを見る。{/n}「陛下…よろしければ、死にゆく私の願いを最後にひとつ…その扉の鍵を開けたのが私だということはご内密に…話せば…奴らは…危害を家族に…家を…」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

traits.locale_text: {n}初老の男は間近に迫る死を知らせるように激しく震え始める。それから、すでに視力を失った目を上げてあなたを見る。{/n}「陛下…よろしければ、死にゆく私の願いを最後にひとつ…その扉の鍵を開けたのが私だということはご内密に…話せば…奴らは…危害を家族に…家を…」

languages.text: {n}老人开始抽搐起来，已然濒临死亡。他抬起已经失明的眼睛，看着你。{/n}“大人……如果您允许将死之人提出最后的请求……请不要告诉任何人是我把那些人放了进来……如果您说了……他们会……他们会杀害我的家人……毁了我的家……”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人开始抽搐起来，已然濒临死亡。他抬起已经失明的眼睛，看着你。{/n}“大人……如果您允许将死之人提出最后的请求……请不要告诉任何人是我把那些人放了进来……如果您说了……他们会……他们会杀害我的家人……毁了我的家……”

languages.text: {n}El anciano empieza a convulsionar, lo que indica que su muerte es inminente. Levanta su mirada, ya ciega, hacia ti.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... si permite a un moribundo hacer una última petición... No le diga a nadie que fui yo quien abrió las puertas... Si lo hace... irán... irán a por mi familia... mi hogar...».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano empieza a convulsionar, lo que indica que su muerte es inminente. Levanta su mirada, ya ciega, hacia ti.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... si permite a un moribundo hacer una última petición... No le diga a nadie que fui yo quien abrió las puertas... Si lo hace... irán... irán a por mi familia... mi hogar...».

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann wird von einem Krampf erfasst, steht kurz vor dem Tod. Er blickt mit seinen bereits blinden Augen zu dir auf.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... bitte gewährt einem Sterbenden einen letzten Wunsch ... Sagt niemandem, dass ich die Türen aufgesperrt habe ... Denn sonst .. holen sie ... meine Familie ... mein Zuhause ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

Sagt niemandem, dass ich die Türen aufgesperrt habe ... Denn sonst .. holen sie ... meine Familie ... mein Zuhause ..."

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme est pris de convulsions indiquant qu'il est aux portes de la mort. Il lève vers vous ses yeux déjà aveugles.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... accordez à un mourant une dernière volonté... Ne dites à personne que c'est moi qui ai ouvert les portes... Si vous le faites... ils s'en prendront à ma famille... à mon foyer... »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme est pris de convulsions indiquant qu'il est aux portes de la mort. Il lève vers vous ses yeux déjà aveugles.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... accordez à un mourant une dernière volonté... Ne dites à personne que c'est moi qui ai ouvert les portes... Si vous le faites... ils s'en prendront à ma famille... à mon foyer... »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, ölmeye yakın olduğunu işaret eder şekilde kıvranmaya başlıyor. Artık görmeyen gözlerini kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ölmekte olan bir adamın son bir istekte bulunmasına müsaade ederseniz... Kapıları açanın ben olduğumu kimseye söylemeyin. Şayet söylerseniz ailemin, evimin peşine düşerler."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man starts to convulse, indicating that he is close to death. He raises his already unseeing eyes to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... if you'll permit a dying man to make one last request... Don't tell anyone that I was the one who unlocked the doors... If you do... they'll... they'll go after my family... my home..."
